de.weltraumschaf.caythe.frontend
Class Token

java.lang.Object
  de.weltraumschaf.caythe.frontend.Token
Direct Known Subclasses:
CayTheToken, EofToken, PascalToken
public class Token
extends Object

Generic token implementation.

Author:
Sven Strittmatter

Field Summary
protected  String text
           
protected  TokenType type
           
protected  Object value
           
 
Constructor Summary
Token(Source source)
          Initializes lineNumber and position from current values of passed in source object, because while extraction the internal cursor of the source object may be advanced.
 
Method Summary

          Delegates to Source.currentChar() of internal Source object.

          Default implementation called by extract().

customExtraction

protected void customExtraction()
                         throws Exception
Default implementation called by extract(). This implementation does nothing. Override this method in tour specific token implementations.

Exception
